chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: Game is written completely in Ruby. While Ruby is an interpreted programming language, it isn't needed (and most probably even not possible) to compile the code. You just have to install Ruby interpreter and a few libraries. Both the interpreter and all needed libraries are licensed by open source licenses and you can download them all for free.
